Uses of Package
yaak.agent.communication

Packages that use yaak.agent.communication
yaak.agent This package implements agent operations. 
yaak.agent.communication This package implements lower level communications services. 
yaak.agent.communication.jdmk This package implements a JDMK-based communications server. 
 

Classes in yaak.agent.communication used by yaak.agent
AgentAddress
          AgentAddress encodes an agent identifier and location.
CommunicationException
          CommunicationException is the base exception class for communications-related exceptions.
CommunicationServerAdmin
          CommunicationServerAdmin handles communication server management.
Executive
          Executive provides core communications functionality.
Message
          Message encodes an agent identifier and location.
MessageFilter
          MessageFilter represents an object that evaluates whether or not the receiver wants the current message.
MessageListener
          MessageListener represents an object that monitors message transport (its arrival) over a channel.
 

Classes in yaak.agent.communication used by yaak.agent.communication
AgentAddress
          AgentAddress encodes an agent identifier and location.
BroadcastChannel
          BroadcastChannel represents one-to-many communications.
ChannelListener
          ChannelListener represents an object that monitors data (object) transport (its arrival) over a channel.
CommunicationChannel
          CommunicationChannel represents one or more communication models.

          CommunicationException is the base exception class for communications-related exceptions.

          Message encodes an agent identifier and location.
MessageFilter
          MessageFilter represents an object that evaluates whether or not the receiver wants the current message.
MessageListener
          MessageListener represents an object that monitors message transport (its arrival) over a channel.
Payload
          Payload is the transport wrapper for any data (object) that's sent over a channel.
PointChannel
          PointChannel represents one-to-one communications.
StringMessage
          StringMessage encodes an agent identifier and location.
